DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Concatenated_gyrB_lepA_PhylotypingTree
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: This NEXUS formatted file provides two items. It provides the masked alignment of gyrB and lepA for the 1095 taxa and cultured isolates, and it provides the single maximum likelihood phylogeny that includes the cultured dung beetle microbiota samples and the 1095 reference bacteria. The RAxML analysis was topologically constrained by the phylogeny resulting from the full analysis of the 1095 bacterial genomes and 264 loci.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: symbiosis

holometabolous development
